message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price. I think you'll really love it!
I appreciate the offer, Alice, but $12,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for the product.  What do you think?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I still need to make a profit. How about we discuss a price of $11,500?
Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price, but $11,500 is still a little too high for me. How about we split the difference and go with $10,750?  I think this is a fair price for both of us.
I'm willing to meet you at $10,750, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair deal too. How about we compromise at $11,000?
Alice, I'm really trying to make this work, but $11,000 is still outside my budget.  I'm sticking to my offer of $10,750.  I think it's a fair price, and I'm confident we can reach an agreement.
I understand you're committed to $10,750, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $10,900?
